contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 5, 2016 D Siddis Brass Entertainment Contest (First Section)
Siddis Brass Entertainment Contest (First Section) 10 Entertainments Contest Siddis Brass Entertainment Contest siddis-brass-entertainment-contest-first-section
First
Stavanger Konserthus (Fartein Valen), Stavanger, Rogaland, Norway Entertainment adjudicator: Liv Elgheim
Soloist prize: Vegard Feste: Trumpet - Tertnes Brass
Montebello Brass skulle blitt dirigert av Michael Antrobus under Siddis Brass 2016. Som følge av hans bortgang valgte Montebello Brass å trekke seg fra konkurransen, og spilte programmet som en minnekonsert etter at 1. divisjon var ferdig. Konserten ble dirigert av Margie Antrobus, Michaels datter.
Montebello Brass were directed by Michael Antrobus this year. As a mark of respect for his recent passing, Montebello Brass chose to withdraw from the competition. They played their entertainment programme at a memorial concert that took place after the completion of this contest. The conductor for the performance was Margie Antrobus, daughter of Michael.
Sept. 19, 2016, 8:31 p.m. Nov. 7, 2016, 8:11 p.m.
1 Musikkorpset Gjallarhorn Rune Gundersen
2 Tertnes Brass Martin Winter
3 Askøy Brass Band Svein Henrik Giske
4 Hasle Brass Robert Solberg Nilsen
5 Radøy Brass Torstein Aagaard-Nilsen
6 Sola Brass Band Selmer Simonsen
7 Alexander Brass Band Morten Hansen
8 Oster Brass David Morton
Withdrawn Montebello Brass Margaret S. Antrobus
